page.title: 07TRAFFIC ON THE A27 EMSWORTH
page.content: The A27 is a very busy road.In 20 minutes there were:- From the{East}9 bikes, 8 motor cycles, 281 cars, 36 vans, 63 lorries, and 2 buses. From the{West}3 bikes, 3 motor cycles, 303 cars, 45 vans, 40 lorries, and 2 buses. This made the total of{THROUGH TRAFFIC as follows{(hourly rate)}:- 12{(36)}bikes, 11{(33)}motor cycles, 584{(1752)}cars, 81{(243)}vans, 103{(309)}lorries, and 4{(12)}buses. This made a{SURVEY TOTAL}of 795{(2285) Many people were concerned about petrol fumes and public health.There are laws to be obeyed like the 40 m.p.h. speed limit and seat belts. A new motorway by-pass{(M27)}is due to be started shortly.
